newsitem.title: TURKEY: Erbakan returns to Turkey after foreign visit.
newsitem.headline: Erbakan returns to Turkey after foreign visit.

text.p: Turkish Prime Minister Necmettin Erbakan arrived back in Turkey overnight after a 10-day tour which took him mainly to Moslem countries, the state-run Anatolian news agency said on Wednesay.
Erbakan was met shortly after midnight at Ankara airport by government ministers and other leading officials on his return from Indonesia.
The trip, his first foreign tour since becoming the country's first Islamist prime minister late in June, also included visits to Iran, Pakistan, Singapore and Malaysia.
